body.name: GAP babyGap Whisper Bedside Bassinet Sleeper with Breathable Mesh and Adjustable Heights - Lightweight Portable Crib - Made with Sustainable Materials, Navy Camo
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 34 mins
features: 2-IN-1 DESIGN: Use as standalone bassinet or as bedside sleeper | Easily convert to bedside sleeper by unzipping and unrolling side wall | Securely attach the bassinet to your adult size bed using the included safety straps

SUSTAINABLE MATERIALS: All the fabric (except the fitted sheet) is made from recycled water bottles | Plastic drinking bottles are sorted, cleaned and shredded into flakes that become the yarn the seat fabric is made from

UNIQUELY GAP BABY: Baby Gap logo creates an elevated look | Large storage pocket keeps essentials like diapers, wipes and more within reach | Breathable mesh allows for airflow and clear view of baby | Bassinet is JPMA certified

LIGHTWEIGHT + PORTABLE: Wheels for easy mobility | Weighs 22.5 lbs. | Size: 26.5”W x 30”D x 36”H; Bedside opening: 27”W | Includes waterproof mattress pad, fitted sheet and beside strap | Fitted sheet and bassinet cover are machine washable

ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT: 6 adjustable height positions accommodate most beds 19-inches to 25.5-inches high | Ideal for newborns and breastfeeding moms, this will help new parents get back to sleep quickly after feeding or comforting baby
body.description: Introducing the babyGap Whisper Bedside Bassinet: The most responsibly made bedside bassinet. Designed for the future in every possible way, all the fabric is made from recycled water bottles. Plastic drinking bottles are sorted, cleaned and shredded into flakes that become the yarn the seat fabric is made from. A great choice for your baby and the planet, its convertible design allows it to be used as a standalone bassinet or as bedside sleeper. When converted into a bedside sleeper, this bassinet provides the closeness and convenience of co-sleeping, while giving your baby their own protected space, plus it makes it easy to soothe and care for your baby, while still in bed. Simply unzip and unroll the side wall of the bassinet and use the included safety straps to securely attach the bassinet to your bed. The bassinet’s adjustable height ensures the perfect fit. Breathable mesh promotes airflow and provides a clear view of your baby, so no matter how you use this bassinet, you’ll be able to safely keep an eye on your little one. Side storage pockets allow you to keep baby’s essentials within reach. This bassinet is recommended for babies 0-5 months. Max weight 30 lbs. Stop use at 5 months or once your infant begins to push up on their hands and knees, whichever comes first. Bassinet includes bedside safety straps, mattress pad and fitted sheet.Gap’s first-ever baby gear collection reimagines timeless American style for modern families. Discover quality designs and go-to essentials that instantly refresh your routine. Think super-functional strollers and wagons, elevated patterns, sustainable materials, and more inspired finds for daily life with your little one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bassinet is STUNNING! It is an excellent and easy-to-use bassinet and my newborn sleeps fantastic in it. We love the Delta X Gap collection; it looks sleek and modern next to our bed. It was easy to assemble and I feel safe having my baby in it to sleep. It is sturdy, aesthetic, and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Bassinet Ever! Mom of 3 Here!
reviews.reviewText: I decided to purchase this bassinet based off the beautiful pink color but am leaving this great review because of the quality of the product! it is such great quality and easy to put together. 10/10 recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, comfortable, perfect size!
reviews.reviewText: I have a 2-week old and was losing hope with trying to get her to sleep on her own in a bassinet. We originally had a bare bones standalone bassinet that was too deep, large, and cold. She hated it and would wake out of a deep sleep the moment her butt touched the mattress. I purchased this bassinet as a last resort attempt and OMG it’s fantastic. Not only is it nice to have her safely next to the bed, but it seems more comfortable for her to be laying in a smaller, more shallow space. The soft mattress is covered in a satin-like material, and the sides are perfectly sized to where it is safe but not oversized. I could go on. If you have a baby that throws a fit as soon as they leave your arms, try this out!!! I took a star away because there’s basically zero storage space. Hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy this was to put together and the print is so cute! It’s a perfect size for your baby to grow into!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was very impressed by this bassinet. It’s the perfect pink color, was so easy to put together, and is very sturdy. Can’t wait to use it for my baby girl!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality. Color is just as shown.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Using this bedside sleeper for when baby boy arrives. Most likely use it for the first year then buy a crib.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The height adjusting clips/ buttons/ whatever you call them are a little tricky. Very important to remember to do one side at a time and not to do too many levels of adjustment at a time either.
